response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. Given its significance to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $9,500. This offer reflects my commitment to ensuring you receive exceptional value while maximizing the return on your investment. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer within the next 24 hours. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 9500}
